title: Ticket #7623: Fix mismatch of gahp ids when using remote_gahp
description:
The INFNBatchJob and INFNBatchResource objects use different IDs for the blahp child process when the remote_gahp is used with additional arguments (e.g. when --rgahp-key is used in the grid_resource line to use a different ssh key). This prevents the INFNBatchResource object from issuing commands to the blahp.

The only practical effect of this at present is that the gridmanager will print this message repeatedly in its log: 

gahp server not up yet, delaying ping
remarks:
2020-Jun-30 12:11:10 by tlmiller:
Code Review

Looks good to me.

Does this require any documentation, given the limited practical effect?

2020-Jun-30 13:43:51 by jfrey:
The only effect of this bug was that this line would appear repeatedly in the gridmanger log: 
gahp server not up yet, delaying ping

So I don't think version history is necessary.
